channel.title: How do you change Point prices in PC? 317
channel.description: I changed it in texthanderl.java and made it says *itemname* 100 points. Yet its still 250. How do I change?

item.title: How do you change Point prices in PC? 317
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Just try searching for the variable’s name and the amount being used.
Most servers have:

pcPoints

So, you’d search for something like:

pcPoints -= 100

And just change the amount being subtracted from there.

Note: If you’re unable to find it in your client class, try your actionButtons class (commonly clickingMost.java).

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change Point prices in PC? 317

item.title: How do you change Point prices in PC? 317
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

PaidPerPk:

I changed it in texthanderl.java and made it says itemname 100 points. Yet its still 250. How do I change?

“Text handler” It’s for editing text not for different futures try searching in client.java for the reward like additem id amount

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change Point prices in PC? 317

item.title: How do you change Point prices in PC? 317
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

You just changed the text, that’s why.

Look for addItem(#itemid#, #item amount#) in your client.java or clickingMost.java
(change #itemid# with the item ID that you are trying to purchase from Pest Control and #item amount# with the amount of that item it gives you when you purchase it)
and somewhere around that it should have something in there about taking 250 points, change it to 100.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change Point prices in PC? 317
